summary: Checco, an uneducated but self-satisfied fellow from Milan, who has always dreamed of becoming a police officer, fails his entrance exam for the third time. It must be said that at the oral... See full summary »
cast: Checco Zalone|Nabiha Akkari|Ivano Marescotti|Michele Alhaique|Luigi Luciano|Rita del Piano|Anna Bellato|Mehdi Mahdloo|Cinzia Mascoli|Paolo De Vita|Bruno Armando|Rocco Papaleo|Tullio Solenghi|Isabelle Adriani|Matteo Reza Azchirvani|Andrea Bonella|Giovanna Bozzolo|Giustina Buonomo|Giuseppe Centola|Anis Gharbi|Lucia Modugno|Alfredo Piano|Maurizio Tabani|Hossein Taheri|Gaetano Varcasia|Maha Yakoub
title: Que hermoso día
